abstract: It would have created a $150 billion giant, but Time Warner and Fox’s shareholders weren’t interested.
snippet: It would have created a $150 billion giant, but Time Warner and Fox’s shareholders weren’t interested.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 9:12 p.m. |  At 4:07 p.m. Tuesday, the chief executive of Time Warner Inc., Jeffrey L. Bewkes, received an unexpected email.

headline.main: After Pushback, Murdoch Abandons Fox’s Pursuit of Time Warner
headline.print_headline: Fox Halts Its Pursuit of a Giant Media Deal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and JONATHAN MAHLER
